headline: Cognizant Expands Partnership with Docusign to Enhance Customer Support and Drive Digital Transformation
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH) announced today an expanded partnership with Docusign (Nasdaq: DOCU), the Intelligent Agreement Management company, to enhance customer support and drive digital transformation. This collaboration expands the existing 360-degree relationship with Cognizant as a services provider, go-to-market partner and customer, deepening the strategic partnership.
